Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Sonata no. 3 in F minor, op. 5

1853

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 39'

  • 1. Allegro maestoso
  • 2. Andante: Andante espressivo
  • 3. Scherzo: Allegro energico
  • 4. Intermezzo (Rückblick): Andante molto
  • 5. Finale: Allegro moderato ma rubato

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/4 · HN 6022 · Klaviersonaten · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Henle · HN 1084 · Sonaten, Scherzo und Balladen · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Henle · HN 1085 · Sonaten, Scherzo und Balladen · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Henle · HN 1290 · ed. Katrin Eich
  • Könemann · K 114 · Sonaten · ed. Enikő Gyenge
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50104 · ed. Christian Martin Schmidt

1. Allegro maestoso

Duration: 10' 30"

Difficulty: 4

2. Andante: Andante espressivo

Duration: 12' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Scherzo: Allegro energico

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 4

4. Intermezzo (Rückblick): Andante molto

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Finale: Allegro moderato ma rubato

Duration: 7' 30"

Difficulty: 5
